item.description:
An amazing way to begin our journey through 2010, Herb is hosting a potluck with reflections and several ceremonies. There will also be plenty of time to socialize and eat! Here is a description of the event from Herb:

“This evening has been presented for 25 years. There's plenty of time to reflect and share (as an option) about what happened to you in 2009 and what you learned this year and to focus on directions and goals for 2010. There's several ceremonies, candlelight and gifts. It's a special experience.”

The ceremony is also a potluck so if you can please bring a vegetarian dish/snack or candy! This being The Unique Journey, feel free to wear a Halloween costume (every day should be Halloween, especially the first day)! Costumes and potluck items are optional, but there is a $15.00 cover charge (to cover Herb‘s professional services and for having an awesome space to hang out). The ceremony begins at 7:00, but feel free to come as early as 6:00 to spend extra time enjoying the potluck and company.
item.name: New Year’s Day Ceremony
